name: Tamagotchi: RED Hound.EXE
description:
Another uni project, This time though aa blast from the past!

TAMAGOTCHI!!! 

yknow! the virtual pet that you took care of. Usually in the form of a small hand held device with no more than 3 buttons. 

Well here is my own take on the game. 

The Art is done in asepirte by myself as is the Programming which is done in UE5.
